name: Tackle
desc: A full body attack that deals a small amount of damage. Has a chance of pushing the target.

name: Petrified
desc: Throw a Petrified to deal a small amount of damage. Has a chance of pushing the target.

name: First Aid
desc: Cure an ally of multiple status ailments.

name: Hustle
desc: Increases target's Agility.

name: Counter Tackle
desc: Counter incoming physical attacks with a Tackle.

name: Equip Axes
desc: Equip Axes, regardless of job.

name: Defend
desc: Prepare to defend against attacks.

name: Apprenticeship
desc: Increase the amount you learn per encounter.

name: Move I
desc: Increases Move.

name: Potion
desc: Use a potion to restore Hp.

name: Mega Potion
desc: Use a Mega Potion to restore Hp.

name: Giga Potion
desc: Use a Giga Potion to restore Hp.

name: Ether
desc: Use an Ether to restore Fp.

name: Mega Ether
desc: Use an Mega Either to restore Fp.

name: Elixir
desc: Use an Elixir to fully restore Hp and Fp.

name: Revive
desc: Use a Revive to restore life to a fallen unit.

name: Antidote
desc: Use an Antidote to nullify poison.

name: Eye Drops
desc: Use Eye Drops restor a the vision of a blinded unit.

name: Stimulant
desc: Use a Stimulant to restore the memory of an amnesic unit.

name: Antimutagen
desc: Use an Antimutagen to return a mutated unit to their original form.

name: Gold Needle
desc: Use a Gold Needle to return a petrified unit back to normal.

name: Holy Water
desc: Use Holy Water to lift the curse of undeath from a unit.

name: Remedy
effect: Removes: Poison, Blind, Amnesia, Toad, Petrified, Sleep
desc: Use a Remedy to cure various status effects.

name: Auto Potion
desc: Uses a Potion to restore HP.

name: Throw Items
desc: Use items with increased range.

name: Reequip
effect: Reequip one item as an action.
desc: Change equipment during battle.

name: MaIntenance
desc: Prevent equipment from being deStroyed or stolen.

name: Gather
effect: Herbs: Potion, Rare Herbs: Mega Potion, Flowers: Ether, Flowering Herbs: Elixir, Antidote Herb: Antidote, Rosemary: Medicine
desc: Craft items using tile materials upon moving to them.

name: Break Helm
desc: A technique that deStroys the item equipped on the target's head.

name: Break Armor
desc: A technique that deStroys the item equipped on the target's body.

name: Break Shield
desc: A technique that deStroys the target's equipped Shield.

name: Break Weapon
desc: A technique that deStroys the target's equipped Weapon.

name: Break Focus
desc: A technique that reduces the target's Focus.

name: Break Dexterity
desc: A technique that reduces the target's Dexterity.

name: Break Agility
desc: A technique that reduces the target's Agility.

name: Break Strength
desc: A technique that reduces the target's physical attack power.

name: Break Intellect
desc: A technique that reduces the target's mAgickal attack power.

name: Parry
effect: Use equiped Weapons, instead of Shields, to calculating Block.
desc: Block physical attacks with equipped weapon.

name: Equip Shields
desc: Equip Shields, regardless of job.

name: Equip Swords
desc: Equip Swords, regardless of job.

name: Equip Armor
desc: Equip Helms and Armor, regardless of job.

name: Aimed Shot
desc: Aim for a sure hit. Deals reduced damage, but ignores target's defenses.

name: Critical Shot
desc: Aim for a hard to hit weak spot to deal extra damage. Target's defenses are doubled for this attack.

name: Leg Shot
desc: Inflict damage to the legs, preventing movement.

name: Arm Shot
desc: Inflict damage to the arms, preventing lthe use attacks.

name: Head Shot
desc: Inflict damage to the head, preventing the use of techniques.

name: Burial
desc: DeStroy the cursed beings known as the Vampirism.

name: Agility Boost
desc: Increases Agility.

name: Cover
effect: Bow, Crossbow, and Gun attacks always miss.
desc: Avoid all attacks from Bow, Crossbow, and Gun attacks.

name: Beastmaster
desc: Unlock an ability for allied monsters that are nearby.

name: Equip Crossbows
desc: Equip Crossbows, regardless of job.

name: Deadeye
desc: Use expert aim to ignore the block and evade ability of all targets.

name: Jump I
desc: Increases Jump.

name: Heal I
desc: Medical Tech that soothes injuries, restoring HP.

name: Heal II
desc: Medical Tech that soothes injuries, restoring HP.

name: Heal III
desc: Medical Tech that soothes injuries, restoring HP.

name: Heal IV
desc: Medical Tech that soothes injuries, restoring HP.

name: Raise
effect: Removes: Dying, Recover: 1/2 of Max Hp
desc: Medical Tech to fetch a warrior from the brink of death. Restores half health.

name: Arise
desc: Medical Tech to fetch a warrior from the brink of death and fully restore HP as well.

name: Relentless
desc: Medical Tech that endows a unit relentless vigor that will revive them once from the brink of death.

name: Regen
desc: Medical technique that invigorates the life force, gradually restoring Hp for a short duration.

name: Fortify I
desc: Medical Tech that Fortifys the physical resistance of a unit to protect their body from physical blows.

name: Fortify II
desc: Medical Tech that Fortifys the physical resistance of a unit to protect their body from physical blows.

name: Bolster I
desc: Medical Tech that bolsters the elemental resistance of a unit to protect their body from tech skills.

name: Bolster II
desc: Medical Tech that bolsters the elemental resistance of a unit to protect their body from tech skills.

name: Bulwark
desc: Medical Tech the provides resistance to both physical blows and tech skills.

name: Cure
effect: Remove: Petrified, Blind, Amnesia, Berserk, Toad, Poison, Sleep, Immobile, Disabled.
desc: Medical Tech that removes negative status effects.

name: Mercy
desc: Medical Tech that removes negative status effects.

name: Regenerate
desc: Self-administered medical tech that provides steady recovery of health.

name: Special Defense
desc: Take less damage from special tech skills.

name: Pummel Fist
desc: Strike many times in quick succession.

name: Sweep Kick
desc: Make a sweeping kick, attacking all nearby units. Attack all adjacent enemies for 1/2 damage.

name: Aura Strike
desc: Employ one's martial spirit to strike a distant foe.

name: Shatter Earth
desc: Release spiritual energy mighty enough to rend the earth.

name: Death Touch
desc: Invite slow, certain death with blows to pressure points.

name: Calmness
desc: Draw out the energy within the body's chakra points to restore HP and MP.

name: Purification
effect: Removes: Petrified, Blind, Amnesia, Berserk, Toad, Poison, Sleep, Immobile, Disabled
desc: Release positive energy to remove status ailments.

name: Resuscitate
desc: Calls back dead units with a loud cry.

name: Critical Health
desc: Fully recover health when critically wounded.

name: Counter
desc: Counter after being attack.

name: Barehanded
desc: Increases the power and accuracy of unarmed attacks by half of level (rounded down).

name: Health Walk
desc: Heal a small amount after moving. 2 x (Lv + End).

name: Mug
desc: Pilfer gil from the target.

name: Coerce
desc: Capture the target's heart, enthralling them.

name: Steal Helm
desc: Purloin the target's equipped helmet.

name: Steal Armor*
desc: Purloin the target's equipped armor.

name: Steal Shield
desc: Purloin the target's equipped shield.

name: Steal Weapon
desc: Purloin the target's equipped weapon.

name: Steal Accessory
desc: Purloin the target's equipped accessory.

name: Steal EXP
desc: Filch experience points from the target.

name: Riposte
desc: Attack preemptively before being attacked.

name: Vigilance
desc: Assume a defensive stance.

name: Pickpocket
desc: Receive gold equal to the amount of damage taken.

name: Catch
desc: Catch thrown items and add them to the party inventory.

name: Looter
desc: Collect items from fallen enemies.

name: Jump II
desc: Increase Jump by 2.

name: Move II
desc: Increase Move by 2.

name: Haste I
desc: Changes perception of time, effectively boosting speed.

name: Haste II
desc: Changes perception of time, effectively boosting speed.

name: Slow I
desc: Changes perception of time, effectively reducing speed.

name: Slow II
desc: Changes perception of time, effectively reducing speed.

name: Stop
desc: Changes perception of time, preventing unit from receiving turns.

name: Immobilize
desc: Time magick that creates an anomaly in space to prevent its targets from moving.*

name: Float
desc: Time magick that warps space, allowing its targets to float a height of 1h above the ground.*

name: Reflect
desc: Time magick that creates a magick-reflecting field.*

name: Quick
desc: Time magick that hastens the localized passage of time, causing the target's turn to come more quickly.*

name: Demi I
desc: Intorduce harmful plants to the body, inflicting damage from within.

name: Demi II
desc: Intorduce harmful plants to the body, inflicting damage from within.

name: Mind Over Matter
desc: Damage is dealt to Fp instead of Hp.

name: Critical Quick
desc: Receive an immediate turn when critically wounded.

name: Wholistic
desc: Reduce Fp consumption by half when using Special techniques that use Fp.

name: Levitate (Euphoria)*
desc: Move while floating a height of 1h above the ground.

name: Umbra
desc: Rob targets of sight, reducing the success rate of their physical attacks.

name: Empowerment
desc: Absorb Fp from the target.

name: Invigoration
desc: Absorb HP from the target.

name: Belief
desc: Fill the target's soul with a zealous fervor.

name: Disbelief
desc: Drain the target's soul of piety.

name: Corruption
desc: Transform the target into one of the walking dead.

name: Quiescence
desc: Rob targets of speech, rendering them unable to cast magicks.

name: Ferver
desc: Impart a thirst for destruction, rendering the target mad for blood.

name: Trepidation
desc: Reduce the target's Bravery.

name: Deirium
desc: Cause the target to become delirious and act irrationally.

name: Harmony
effect: Removes: Float, Reraise, Invisible, Regen, Fortify, Bolster, Haste, Alert, Reflect
desc: Neutralize beneficial status effects on the target.

name: Hesitation
desc: Render the target incapable of action.

name: Repose
desc: Put the target into a deep slumber.

name: Induration
desc: Turn the target's body into stone.

name: Absorb Focus
desc: Recover Fp equal to the amount used by the opponent.

name: Defense Boost
desc: Take less damage from physical attacks.

name: Ignore Weather
desc: Traverse any marsh, swamp, or poisonous fen unimpeded by weather conditions.

name: Manafont
desc: Recover MP upon moving.

name: Sinkhole
desc: A geomancy skill that inflicts damage by opening rifts in space-time.

name: Torrent
desc: A geomancy skill that inflicts damage with the power of water.
tags: Terrain: Canal, River, Lake, Ocean, Waterfall

name: Tanglevine
desc: A geomancy skill that inflicts damage with the power of plants.

name: Contortion
desc: A geomancy skill that inflicts damage with the power of stone.
tags: Terrain: Gravel, Flagstone, Stone Wall, Earthen Wall, Gravestone

name: Tremor
desc: A geomancy skill that inflicts damage with the power of rock.

name: Wind Slash
desc: A geomancy skill that inflicts damage with the power of air.
tags: Terrain: Book, Tree, Brick, Bridge, Furnishings, Iron Plate, Moss, Coffin

name: Will-o'-Wisp
desc: A geomancy skill that inflicts damage with the power of the surrounding terrain.
tags: Terrain: Wooden Floor, Carpet, Coffer, Stairs, Wooden Deck

name: Quicksand
desc: A geomancy skill that inflicts damage with the power of water.

name: Sandstorm
desc: A geomancy skill that inflicts damage with the power of dust.

name: Snowstorm
desc: A geomancy skill that inflicts damage with the power of snow.

name: Wind Blast
desc: A geomancy skill that inflicts damage with the power of wind.

name: Magma Surge
desc: A geomancy skill that inflicts damage with the power of magma.

name: Nature's Wrath
desc: Counterattack with a geomancy skill.

name: Physical Boost
desc: Inflict greater damage with physical attacks.

name: Lava Walking
desc: Walk across and even stop on the surface of lava.

name: Ignore Terrain
desc: Move unimpeded through watery terrain.

name: Horizontal Jump 2
desc: Jump 2 tiles horizontally.

name: Horizontal Jump 3
desc: Jump 3 tiles horizontally.

name: Horizontal Jump 4
desc: Jump 4 tiles horizontally.

name: Horizontal Jump 5
desc: Jump 5 tiles horizontally.

name: Horizontal Jump 8
desc: Jump 8 tiles horizontally.

name: Vertical Jump 2
desc: Jump 2 tiles vertically.

name: Vertical Jump 3
desc: Jump 3 tiles vertically.

name: Vertical Jump 4
desc: Jump 4 tiles vertically.

name: Vertical Jump 5
desc: Jump 5 tiles vertically.

name: Vertical Jump 6
desc: Jump 6 tiles vertically.

name: Vertical Jump 7
desc: Jump 7 tiles vertically.

name: Vertical Jump 8
desc: Jump 8 tiles vertically.

name: Expert Guard
desc: Prevent Hp & Fp damage for 1 turn.

name: Protect
desc: Switch places with a nearby ally when they're attacked.

name: Indomitable
desc: Recover from KO status.

name: Equip Spear
desc: Equip polearms, regardless of job.

name: Ignore Elevation
desc: Move to tiles of any height, regardless of Jump attribute.

name: Moogle
desc: Moogle Charm. An esper that soothes injuries with a purifying breeze, restoring HP.

name: Ifrit
desc: Infernal Blaze. An esper whose breath of flame scorches the battlefield.

name: Shiva
desc: Glacial Shards. An esper with punishingly frigid breath.

name: Rahum
desc: Judgment Bolt. An esper that relentlessly rains down lightning.

name: Titan
desc: Gaia's Wrath. An esper that levels the earth with a mighty blow.

name: Golem
desc: Earthen Wall. An esper that absorbs damage from physical attacks on behalf of allies until its limit is reached.

name: Carbuncle
desc: Ruby Light. An esper whose ruby light reflects magicks cast on allies.

name: Bahamut
desc: Megaflare. An esper that attacks with its fearsome breath.

name: Faerie
desc: Fey Light. An esper that restores HP.

name: Salamander
desc: Wyrmfire. An esper that scorches the battlefield with its savage flames.

name: Leviathan
desc: Tidal Wave. An esper that engulfs the battlefield in a massive tidal wave.

name: Odin
desc: Obliteration. An esper that charges through the battlefield astride a fearsome mount, doing great damage.

name: Cyclops
desc: Climactic Fear. An esper whose forceful blows tear the battlefield asunder.

name: Lich
desc: Descending Darkness. An esper born in, of, and to darkness. Deals out devastating dark damage.

name: Sylph
desc: Whispering Wind. An esper that employs the lingering life force of windswept leaves to silence enemies.

name: Zodiark
desc: Darkening Cloud. An esper that bathes the earth in radiant beams of focused starlight.

name: Critical Focus
desc: Recover Fp when critically wounded.

name: Hyper Focus
desc: Double Fp consumption to double power of Special techniques that use Fp.

name: Deep One
desc: Able to learn and equip aquatic mobs as a job.

name: Recruit
desc: A speechcraft skill that persuades a foe to become an ally.

name: Stall
desc: A speechcraft skill that persuades a foe to wait before acting. Resets the target's CT count.

name: Praise
desc: A speechcraft skill that praises the target's feats and strengths, increasing his or her Bravery.

name: Intimidate
desc: A speechcraft skill that plays upon the doubts and fears of the target, decreasing his or her Bravery.

name: Preach
desc: A speechcraft skill that explains the nature of divine miracles, deepening belief and increasing Faith.

name: Enlighten
desc: A speechcraft skill that decreases Faith by using cold logic and secular doctrine.

name: Condemn
desc: A speechcraft skill that convinces the target that his or her demise is soon at hand.

name: Beg
desc: A speechcraft skill that spins tales in return for gil.

name: Insult
desc: A speechcraft skill that infuriates with foul invective.

name: Mimic Darlavon
desc: A speechcraft skill that uses dull tales to induce slumber.

name: Conviction
desc: Avoid the effects of Speechcraft.

name: Polyglot
desc: Gain the ability to use Speechcraft against monsters, even if not an orator.

name: Recruiter
desc: Force a critically wounded enemy monster to become an ally.

name: Equip Guns
desc: Equip guns, regardless of job.

name: Ashura
desc: Spirit Blade. A technique that releases the spirit in the user's katana, causing an unseen specter-sword to slash at the target.

name: Kotetsu
desc: Binding Darkness. A technique that releases the spirit in the user's katana, loosing a wave of howling dark spirits.

name: Osafune
desc: Verse of Oblivion. A technique that releases the spirit in the user's katana, sending the whispering dead to feed on the target's MP.

name: Murasame
desc: Rain of Wisdom. A technique that releases the spirit in the user's katana, raining tears of an enlightened soul to restore HP.

name: Ame-no-Murakumo
desc: Cloudsea Curse. A technique that releases the spirit in the user's katana, releasing a phantom of pure mist to attack the target.

name: Kiyomori
desc: Purifying Breeze. A technique that releases the spirit in the user's katana, bestowing the protection of its effervescent life force.

name: Muramasa
desc: Doomed Aspirations. A technique that releases the spirit in the user's katana. Only a living soul will quell its tumult.

name: Kiku-ichimonji
desc: Sanguine Blossom. A technique that releases the spirit in the user's katana, wreaking havoc with its all-consuming hatred.

name: Masamune
desc: Ethereal Embrace. A technique that releases the spirit in the user's katana, bestowing physical healing and increased speed.

name: Chirijiraden
desc: Raging Inferno. A technique that releases the spirit in the user's katana, which pursues the living as a band of blue flame.

name: Shirahadori
desc: Evade non-ranged physical attacks.

name: Bonecrusher
desc: Deal damage equal to own maximum HP when critically wounded.

name: Equip Katana
desc: Equip katana, regardless of job.

name: Doublehand
desc: Wield a weapon with both hands, increasing its destructive power.

name: Swim
desc: Swim through and even act in deep water.

name: Shuriken
desc: Attack by throwing shuriken from inventory.

name: Bomb
desc: Attack by throwing bombs from inventory.

name: Knife
desc: Attack by throwing knives from inventory.

name: Sword
desc: Attack by throwing swords from inventory.

name: Flail
desc: Attack by throwing flails from inventory.

name: Katana
desc: Attack by throwing katana from inventory.

name: Ninja Blade
desc: Attack by throwing ninja blades from inventory.

name: Polearm
desc: Attack by throwing polearms from inventory.

name: Pole
desc: Attack by throwing poles from inventory.

name: Knight's Sword
desc: Attack by throwing knight's swords from inventory.

name: Book
desc: Attack by throwing books from inventory.

name: Axe
desc: Attack by throwing axes from inventory.

name: Reflexes
desc: Evade attacks with greater ease.

name: Vanish
desc: Become transparent.

name: Dual Wield
desc: Wield a weapon in each hand, attacking twice each turn.

name: Waterwalking
desc: Walk across and even stop on the surface of water.

name: Meteor (Calamity)*
desc: Time magick that warps space-time, causing an enormous meteor to fall on the battlefield.*

name: Cup of Life
desc: When HP is restored, distribute any excess among one's allies.

name: Karma
desc: Split any damage taken with the opponent who inflicted it.

name: EXP Boost
desc: Earn more EXP for the same actions.

name: Accrue EXP
desc: Obtain EXP upon moving.

name: Accrue JP
desc: Obtain JP upon moving.

name: Seraph Song
desc: A song pleading for angelic protection. Restores MP.

name: Life's Anthem
desc: A song praising the vibrance of life. Restores HP.

name: Rousing Melody
desc: A song of encouragement and inspiration. Increases Speed.

name: Battle Chant
desc: A gallant song of battles fought and won. Increases physical attack power.

name: Magickal Refrain
desc: A song of the laws of sorcery and of the source of magick. Increases magickal attack power.

name: Nameless Song
effect: Adds: Reraise, Regen, Protect, Shell, or Haste.
desc: A thoroughly mysterious song passed down through many an age. Bestows various types of protection.

name: Finale
desc: The ultimate song. Increases allies' CT to 100.

name: Strength Boost
desc: Increase Strength by 1.

name: Success Boost
desc: Increases the likelihood of techniques that cause status effects. Technique Checks +1.

name: Fly
desc: Fly over enemies as well as any other obstacles.

name: Witch Hunt
desc: A dance whose esoteric moves reduce enemies' MP.

name: Mincing Minuet
desc: A dance whose fervent steps damage enemies' HP.

name: Slow Dance
desc: A dance whose sedate pace reduces enemies' Speed.

name: Polka
desc: A quick, vivacious dance that reduces enemies' physical attack power.

name: Heathen Frolick
effect: Adds: Blind, Confuse, Silence, Toad, Poison, Slow, Stop, Sleep.
desc: An exotic dance that clouds the mind, reducing enemies' magickal attack power.

name: Forbidden Dance
desc: A mesmerizing dance that inflicts status effects.

name: Last Waltz
desc: The ultimate dance. Drops the CT of Enemies to zero.

name: Accuracy Boost
desc: Increase Bravery.

name: Intelligence Boost
desc: Increase magickal attack power.

name: Teleport
desc: Warp instantly to destination tiles. May fail when attempting to travel to distant locations.

name: Cheer
desc: Increase Bravery, Speed, and physical and magickal attack power with a hearty battle cry.

name: Sacrifice
desc: Self damge to heal double.

name: Judgement
desc: Channel holy energy through sword to inflict damage.

name: Damnation
desc: Channel holy energy through sword to inflict damage.

name: Pity
desc: Channel holy energy through sword to inflict damage.

name: Rapture
desc: Channel holy energy through sword to inflict damage.

name: Indignation
desc: Channel holy energy through sword to inflict damage.

name: HP Boost
desc: Increase maximum HP by 20 percent.

name: Jump III
desc: Increase Jump by 3.

name: Brutality
desc: Absorb Hp from the target.

name: Cruelty
desc: Absorb Fp from the target.

name: Discipline
desc: Employ the power of darkness to absorb the target's Hp.

name: Chastise
desc: Employ the power of darkness to absorb the target's Fp.

name: Justice
effect: Adds: Blind, Reduce Hp: 1/3 Caster's Full Hp
desc: Inflict damage with a sinister sword.

name: Punishment
effect: Adds: Slow, Reduce Hp: 1/3 Caster's Full Hp
desc: Sacrifice own HP to deal extensive damage to all units in range.

name: Hateful Burst (Condemn)
desc: Sacrifice own HP to deal damage to others, with the nearest units suffering the most damage.

name: Vehemence
desc: Increase attack power by 50 percent and decrease defensive power by 50 percent.

name: Move III
desc: Increase Movement by 3.

name: Headbutt
desc: Attack with a rushing body blow.

name: Stink Cloud
desc: Soundly thrash foes in four directions.

name: Loafe
desc: Attack the eyes, robbing the target of sight.

name: Tantrum
effect: Reduce Health: 3/4 full Hp, Add: Relentless (Self)
desc: Attack with a thorough beating.

name: Foul Gift
desc: Present target with a foul gift that will scare them stiff.

name: Screech
effect: Removes: Float, Reraise, Invisible, Regen, Protect, Shell, Haste, Faith, Reflect
desc: Nullify status effects by producing uncanny sound waves.

name: Shed Skin
effect: Removes: Petrified, Blind, Amnesia, Poison, Stop, Immobile, Disabled
desc: Chance to automatically recovers from status effects by shedding old skin. 50% chance every turn.

name: Pellet
desc: Attack by pecking with enormous beak.

name: Egg Bomb
desc: Attack by raining down a destructive egg-like orb.

name: Calm Down
desc: Invigorate the life force and restore HP with a flap of the wings.

name: Cool Down
effect: Removes: Petrified, Blind, Amnesia, Poison, Stop, Immobile, Disabled
desc: Purge status effects with a cleansing flap of the wings.

name: Takedown
desc: A lunging attack that attempts to knock its target off of their feet.

name: Cull the Herd
desc: Attack by biting with an enormous mouth. Deal additional damage to targets with Status Ailments.

name: Howl
desc: A powerful howl that raises strength.

name: Forage
desc: Heal by moving to the location of an object. 2 x (Lv + End)

name: Withdraw
desc: Defend for 1 turn

name: Closed Off
desc: Immune: Charm, Traitor, Vampirism

name: Attatched
desc: Cannot be moved by other units.

name: Keen Senses
desc: Immune: Stealth

name: Venom Strike
desc: Poison the target by injecting venom.

name: Spout
desc: Attack by unleashing a water spirit.

name: Sleep Touch
desc: Put the target in a deep sleep with a touch.

name: Drain Touch
desc: Drain HP from the target with a foul touch.

name: Hex
desc: Attack by shooting out flames.

name: Spark
desc: Attack the area with spreading flames.

name: Absorb Cold
desc: Absorb: cold

name: Lick
desc: Smear on viscous saliva to form an invisible, magick-reflecting wall.

name: Goo
desc: Belch forth sticky secretions from deep within to gum up the target and prevent movement.

name: Gore
desc: Attack by goring and tossing the target.

name: Havoc
desc: Call forth a tornado to damage the surrounding area.

name: Numbing Spores
desc: Employ the life force of leaves to increase resistance to magickal attacks.

name: Life Nymph
desc: Employ the life force of leaves to restore HP.

name: Magick Nymph
desc: Employ the life force of leaves to restore MP.

name: Bomblet (PA)
desc: Attack by tossing a bomblet as a grenade.

name: Bomblet (MA)
desc: Attack by tossing a bomblet as a grenade.

name: Self-Destruct
desc: Self-destruct, inflicting damage in the surrounding area.

name: Cat Scratch
desc: Attack with a powerful kick.

name: Blaster
desc: Attack by releasing luminous energy.

name: Vampire
desc: Feast on the target's blood to restore HP.

name: Tentacles
desc: Attack with long, thin, whip-like tentacles.

name: Ink
desc: Rob the target of sight by belching black ink.

name: Dischord
effect: Removes: Float, Reraise, Invisible, Regen, Protect, Shell, Haste, Faith, Reflect
desc: Nullify status effects by producing uncanny sound waves.

name: Mind Blast
desc: Disrupt the psyche, destroying the rational mind.

name: Level Drain
desc: Abscond with a fragment of the soul, lowering the target's level by 1.

name: Chop
desc: Strike the target with a bony-handed chop.

name: Thunder Anima
desc: Attack by unleashing a lightning spirit.

name: Ice Anima
desc: Attack by unleashing an ice spirit.

name: Wind Anima
desc: Attack by unleashing a wind spirit.

name: Ectoplasm
desc: Attack by striking with a mass of arcane power.

name: Zombie Touch
desc: Corrupt the target's flesh, turning it undead.

name: Wing Buffet
desc: Attack with a mighty wing-flap.

name: Dread Gaze
effect: Adds: Petrified, Blind, Silence, Immobilize, or Disable
desc: Powerful gaze discourages you.

name: Bewitching Gaze
desc: Inflict status effects with the overwhelming gaze of a massive eye.

name: Beam
desc: Dissolve magick skills, reducing magick attack power with the overwhelming gaze of a massive eye.

name: Doom
desc: Gaze into the aether to find and cut short the target's silvery thread of life.

name: Talon Dive
desc: Attack by tearing with talons while in midair.

name: Beak
desc: Attack vital spots with a long beak, petrifying the target.

name: Glitterlust
desc: Receive glittering gil.

name: Featherbomb
desc: Attack by dropping an explosive feather on the target.

name: Peck
desc: Employ a special skill that reduces physical attack power.

name: Reckless Charge
desc: Run at the target at full tilt, crashing into them.

name: Snort
desc: Mesmerize the target with a ferocious snort.

name: Squeak
desc: Use a fierce cry to summon KO'd units from the brink of death and restore their HP.

name: Toot
desc: Inflict status effects with an eye-watering miasma.

name: Bequeath Bacon
desc: The ultimate act of porcine altruism.

name: Leaf Rain
desc: Attack by sprinkling leaves about.

name: Guardian Nymph
desc: Employ the life force of leaves to increase resistance to physical attacks.

name: Pickaxe
desc: Attack with a mighty pickaxe blow.

name: Feral Spin
desc: Attack with a fearsome spin of the pickaxe.

name: Earthsplitter
desc: Attack by stamping the earth, dispatching a shockwave throughout the vicinity.

name: Beef Up
desc: Increase physical attack power by stamping the earth and absorbing its life force.

name: Breathe Fire
desc: Expel a combustible liquid produced in the body and set it alight, attacking with flaming breath.

name: Tentacles
desc: Attack by flinging filthy tentacles about.

name: Bad Breath
effect: Adds: Petrified, Blind, Confuse, Silence, Oil, Toad, Poison, Sleep (25% each)
desc: Belch forth putrid stench to inflict status ailments.

name: Malboro Spores
desc: Coat the target in malboro spores, turning it into a malboro.

name: Almagest
desc: Inflict damage by bringing about a space-time warp set in place by stars twinkling in the firmament.

name: Gigaflare
desc: Attack by bringing down a burst of white-hot energy.

name: Charge
desc: Inflict damage with a body blow.

name: Tail Sweep
desc: Attack by swinging a thick tail.

name: Ice Breath
desc: Attack with breath of ice.

name: Fire Breath
desc: Attack with breath of flame.

name: Thunder Breath
desc: Attack with breath of lightning.

name: Tri-Attack
desc: Each of three heads attacks in turn.

name: Tri-Breath
desc: Each of three heads attacks with insidious breath.

name: Tri-Thunder
desc: Each of three heads attacks with lightning.

name: Tri-Flame
desc: Each of three heads attacks with flame.

name: Dark Whisper
desc: Each of three heads attacks with darkness.

name: Destroy
desc: A top-level operation command. Destroy the target.

name: Compress
desc: A top-level operation command. Compress the target.

name: Dispose
desc: A top-level operation command. Dispose of a target.

name: Pulverize
desc: A top-level operation command. Pulverize the target.

name: Karma
desc: Attack with a wave of lost life force. The lower the user's HP, the greater damage inflicted.

name: Unholy Darkness
desc: Magick that inflicts damage by enveloping the target in a pitch-black void.

name: Gigaflare
desc: Attack by bringing down a burst of white-hot energy.

name: Ultima
desc: Magick that inflicts damages with pure energy.

name: Twister
desc: Call forth a tornado to damage the surrounding area.

name: Almagest
desc: Inflict damage by bringing about a space-time warp set in place by stars twinkling in the firmament.
